Package org.action.enquiry

Class Enquiries

java.lang.Object
org.action.enquiry.Enquiries
public class Enquiries extends Object
Represents the enquiry in the BTO system. This class stores information about the enquiry, which include its content, and related metadata such as timestamps and user information.

    • Enquiries

      public Enquiries(String id, String projectID, String userId, String username, String text, String reply, LocalDateTime timestamp)
      Constructor for creating a new enquiry object.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID for the enquiry
      projectID - The project ID for this enquiry
      userId - The user ID of the person who created the enquiry
      username - The username of the person who created the enquiry
      text - The text content of the enquiry
      reply - The reply to the enquiry
      timestamp - The timestamp when the enquiry was created

    • filter

      public boolean filter(String userId, String projectId, String enquiryId)
      Filters the enquiry based on the provided parameters.
      Parameters:
      userId - Filter by user ID (empty string to ignore this filter)
      projectId - Filter by project ID (empty string to ignore this filter)
      enquiryId - Filter by enquiry ID (empty string to ignore this filter)
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry matches the filter criteria, false otherwise
